title: Celemeta
author: Celemeta
content: https://i.ibb.co/k9Y3Gqf/2023-07-12-6-03-34.png╔═ Welcome to the Celemeta Guardian Program ═╗Celemeta is a diverse network service platform. Composed of top technical personnel from various fields such as network software and hardware, cloud computing, art design, medical care, and blockchain technology. We are excited to invite you to be a part of our growing community and contribute to the success of Celemeta.╔═ Follow Us ═╗Website | Telegram | Discord | Medium | Uniswap  There will be a total of 50000CETA tokens allocated as Guardian Program rewards.Submit the form to join our bounty program!!●General RulesThe Guardian program was launched on 10.07.2023 and will run until 10.09.2023A. All participants must join Celemeta Telegram/Twitter/DiscordB. Participants must submit the FORM in order to claim the rewards.C. By agreeing to participate in Guardian, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, Celemeta reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.D. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the GuardianProgram. ▌ To Participate  ▌Step 1. Submit the FORM.Step 2. Getting to Know the Celemeta Guardian Program.Step 3. Complete the Task that you desire in the Zealy.╔═ CetaBuilder ═╗Rewards:10000CETAZealy Task:1. Article & Blog.2. Videos.3. Poster Design & Graphics.╔═ CetaFriend ═╗Rewards:10000CETAZealy Task:1. Sharing.2.  Communication.3.  Participate.╔═ CetaFamily ═╗Rewards:10000CETAZealy Task:1. CETA Token holder.╔═ CETA Diplomat ═╗Rewards:10000CETAZealy Task:1. Into Celemeta.2. Invite.3. Connector.╔═ CETA Guider ═╗Rewards:10000CETAZealy Task:1. Experience Testing.2. Feature Analysis and Tutorials.●QuestionsReach out if any questionsPlease feel free to contact us with any questions. The feedback of our community is invaluable in helping us build a better Celemeta for the future - keep it coming! We are happy to assist you. We look forward to this small step on Celemeta's path to underpin the trustless token ecosystem of the future!-  Celemeta Telegram - https://t.me/celemeta●IMPORTANTTo receive and earn CETA tokens, participants will perform as many Guardians tasks as they want by following the requirements below and submitting a Guardian Reward Report for the task that was performed.Each task will be validated before the tokens are distributed. Only tasks that follow the Guardian program terms will be eligible to receive the rewards.We will finish reviewing your Zealy claims, your content quality, and social media engagement, and we will add tokens to your wallet. Please note that the content must be published and accessible at all times.
